version_description: This version of Plotagraph+ is compatible with iPhone SE, iPhone 6, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus. Updated Sharing presets, Updated crop functionality, bug fixes, Improved Optimization
